message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's a fantastic deal for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $120
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I've already invested a lot in this product. I can meet you in the middle at $140.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $130
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're not meeting in the middle after all. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need $145 to make it worth my while.
I understand you need to make a profit, but $145 is still a bit too high for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $135
